title: Fab noir
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Debbie Packham, Christine Wardale, Jack White and Phillip Healy
brief_description: The acrid smell of stale socks hung heavily in the air - Clay motions to open the window but the phone rings. 2am was always a bad time to die. Cast includes Peter Moon, Peter Stretton.
